_simulation.startTime: Start time, set by simulator, when animation simulation started
_simulation.finishTime: End time, set by simulator, when animation simulation started
_simulation.startValue: Initial value, set before changes of animated property
_simulation.finalValue: Final value, set before changes of animated property
_simulation.reverse: ? flag, set by simulator, shows that animation should go backwards (for infinite)

translations.updateValue: function({timePassed, linearProgress, animationData, targetObject}) actual value changer
translations.infinite: flag, if animation should be looped
translations.next: ? Link to next animation, which should be started after this one
